name: Short Dress
text: Short dress in woven fabric. Round neckline and opening at back of neck with a button. Yoke at back with concealed pleats, long sleeves, and narrow cuffs with ties. Side pockets. 100% polyester. Machine wash cold.

name: Patterned Slacks
text: Ankle-length slacks in patterned stretch cotton satin. Regular waist with concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Side pockets and tapered legs with slits at hems. 61% cotton, 36% polyester, 3% spandex. Machine wash...

name: Short Chiffon Dress
text: Short V-neck dress in plumeti chiffon. Gathers and small ruffle at shoulders, dropped shoulders, and long, wide sleeves with buttons at cuffs. Narrow, elasticized seam at waist and circle skirt with ruffled tiers. Lined. 100% polyester. Machine wash warm.

name: Off-the-shoulder Dress
text: Short, fitted off-the-shoulder dress in stretch ribbed fabric. Short raglan sleeves, seam at waist with gently flared skirt. Unlined. 54% rayon, 44% nylon, 2% spandex. Machine wash warm.

name: V-neck Top
text: Top in woven fabric with V-neck front and back. Narrow shoulder straps and decorative straps at back. 100% polyester. Machine wash cold.

name: Short Chiffon Dress
text: Short V-neck dress in plumeti chiffon. Gathers and small ruffle at shoulders, dropped shoulders, and long, wide sleeves with buttons at cuffs. Narrow, elasticized seam at waist and circle skirt with ruffled tiers. Lined. 100% polyester. Machine wash warm.

name: V-neck Top
text: Top in woven fabric with V-neck front and back. Narrow shoulder straps and decorative straps at back. 100% polyester. Machine wash cold.

name: V-neck Top
text: Top in woven fabric with V-neck front and back. Narrow shoulder straps and decorative straps at back. 100% polyester. Machine wash cold.

name: Short Lace Dress
text: Short, straight-cut dress in lace. Opening at back with concealed button at back of neck. Round neck, padded shoulders, and 3/4-length sleeves. Lined. 51% cotton, 25% nylon, 24% rayon. Machine wash cold.
